byline.contributor: Iliana Magra contributed reporting from Thessaloniki, Greece.
byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and VINOD SREEHARSHA

lead_paragraph: The police said that the wife of Kyriakos Amiridis, the Greek ambassador to Brazil, had her lover kill him and set his body on fire.
snippet: The police said that the wife of Kyriakos Amiridis, the Greek ambassador to Brazil, had her lover kill him and set his body on fire....

headline.main: Wife and Her Lover Are Arrested in Killing of Greek Envoy in Brazil
headline.print_headline: 3 Held in Killing of Greek Envoy to Brazil, Including His Wife and Her Lover
